short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Build your ultimate wishlist while browsing the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Organize all your wishlists in one place with Periphery's free browser extension. Easily save and categorize products as you browse online. Create beautiful visual boards at Periphery.app, explore curated inspiration, and discover discounts from your favorite retailers.

Inquiries and feedback: hello@periphery.app
